title: [Bug] My patcher will not open after patch 4.21!
body:
Hey everyone, 

We've noticed that there has been an increase in players that are experiencing issues with the 4.21 Patch. We have three potential fixes that may resolve this issue for you guys:

1) Localhosts files have been negatively affecting this patch. Players who have 0.0.0.0 as their localhost are not able to open the game. We are currently investigating this issue, in the meantime players can try to run a Host File reset by using the [Microsoft Fixit](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/972034). 

***NOTE***: This will reset your Hosts file. As long as you run the Microsoft Fixit, this shouldn't negatively impact your computer. If you are playing from a Campus or from a restricted Network, you should verify with your Network Administrator before altering these files. 

2) For players using Avast! Antivirus, another potential fix for this issue is to uninstall the program. Avast may be blocking the connection between your computer and our patcher server.  Please run the [Avast Uninstall Utility](http://www.avast.com/en-us/uninstall-utility). 

3) Another fix is to run through the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) article on our support site! It has a list of the most common solutions for these types of issues.


Players affected by patching issues can also help us investigate further by attaching their Patcher Logs by following these steps:

- Navigate to Your Installation Location (Generally C:) > Riot Games > League of Legends > Logs > Patcher Logs

- Find the most recent patcher and patcherUx logs. You can find the most up to date by observing the titles.
 The logs should look like this: 2014-12-10T15_LolPatcher.log and 2014-12-10T15_LolPatcherUx.log

- Then Attach it to your post here!


If none of these help resolve your issues, Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) on our support site! Our Tech team can assist further!

replies.body:
Solution:
Go to your LoL folder -> RADS -> projects -> lol_patcher -> releases and delete folder 0.0.0.14 and then run again lol launcher, enjoy game :D
Thank you!  This fixed it for me. (except with 0.0.0.15 folder was causing my problem).
I would like to make love to you{{item:1055}} {{item:1056}}
Didn't work for me :/
THIS GUY, THIS GUY
Many thanks, worked perfectly :)
f-ing hell you saved my life after 3 hours of research
OMG THATS DUDE THIS WORKED ILY MAN
I dont have 0.0.0.14 i have 0.0.0.20. When LolPatcherUx starts launching it just says application not responding and just quits without warning. It doesnt even take me to the Login part.

Every time I do this the folder just recreates it self.  So basically I delete folder 0.0.0.13 and when I open league the folder 0.0.0.13 is again in the releases folder.  Anyone know why this is happening or how to fix this? 

note: I'm using a mac.

Another Note: I've changed the name of the file manually, doesn't work.  Just changes back to 0.0.0.13 when I open league.

Okay so seeing as how the game ran fine with my anti-virus 3 days ago, I'm not uninstalling my anti-virus because you guys did something stupid in your last patch. Why don't you roll it back and figure out what mistake you made instead of making me uninstall a perfectly-working application?
Lol they're funny aren't they?
I tried EVERYTHING else, including changing the host file myself. For some reason the fixit program worked. THANK YOU. Someone needs to bump your salary asap.

Bump salary? This is a fckup by riot and it happens almost every single patch... No dont give this guy a bump in his salary, give riot a working solution that eliminates this problem from repeating itself every other month
"Hey google it and do it yourself you shithead!" is not a professional way of handling this.
Also, uninstalling your antivirus is not considered a permanent solution, it's a debugging process. The patcher/client needs to be reworked BEFORE release....

I was unable to get the log in screen to appear reliably, I tried many different methods to attempt to fix it, including deleting and changing files, re-downloading the game and changing my resolution.
All the methods I tried worked once each, then trying them again yielded no results.... it was very strange.
Regardless of that I kept trying to think of ways to get my log in screen to appear and I managed to work out a simple method which has now worked every time.

Just launch the LolClient.exe in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.121\deploy
The log in screen will appear, with a message stating it is unable to connect to maestro.
Then close it and launch the patcher and start the game normally.
patcher still not working for me...3 weeks later
I've been having the same problem on my Mac. The patcher won't launch. Sometimes I get lucky and it does after many repeated attempts, but I can't access the server and log into my account.

Please help my launcher wont even open now. I love this "free" game. I have easily spent hundreds of dollars on this game in support of it. Now my Launcher wont even open after patch this is ridiculous.

I am having these problems as well. On top of it, tried to run the fixes but to no avail. Going to try a full reinstall but not expecting much. Also tried running a custom bot stomp but it still wouldn't let me connect.
So the real problem was having Microsoft Silverlight. Apparently it conflicts with adobe air and my computer did an update with it recently.

SWEET BABY JESUS. Just uninstalled Silverlight (using control panel/add and remove programs) and bam. League works. I have had a trouble ticket in for 3 days now with 1 reply. You the real MVP.{{summoner:31}}
These are my patch logs, I have no clue why it's not working. Anyone that can help me out? :(

Solution:
Go to your LoL folder -> RADS -> projects -> lol_patcher -> releases and delete folder 0.0.0.14 and then run again lol launcher, enjoy game :D
I dont have 0.0.0.14 i only have 0.0.0.13 and i dont know how to change anything else ive tried everything
Thank You! I had to completely uninstall Avast. Excluding league or disabling Avast for whatever time did not work.

Thanks for posting this! 

I was really, really hesitant to remove avast because I had league excluded, and disabled avast in attempt to get LoL working (I sincerely didn't think avast was causing the issue). 

I tried all the steps listed above, and then some (I had a support ticket pending also). 

Your post convinced me to try uninstalling, and my LoL is working again (as well as some other programs that had identical symptoms as LoL). 

As much as it pains me to say this (I really liked using avast) if anyone running avast is having this issue should uninstall avast. 
Disabling avast, and adding riot to the exceptions didn't work for me, uninstalling did.

I had this problem yesterday and I went nuts trying to fix it! Tried everything suggested in every forum post and Reddit thread and nothing seemed to work! and so today in the morning I finally decided to do a fresh install but with no luck again. It was time I submitted a ticket. But then right after I looked at my twitter and saw this post ran Microsoft Fix It and it did just that finally fixed it!!! :D Can not wait for snowdown! much love Digital Ram. Hopefully running Fit It solves the problem for everyone else as well.
Still doesn't work. It has been weeks. I missed the free week of ziggs and kalista, bot of which I was really excited to try. Winter break is also almost over, and I haven't played a game.
I have an mac. The patcher works fine then its just quit without any sign or warning.. pls help
I have avast but I dont want to remove it :S I guess I'll just wait until its fixed and not play LoL until then.
Please help me!Tried all SOLUTIONS NONE WORKSSS~ even ran the local host !

i remove avast and fix my host file and still nothing works for me.. :( riot help mee pls.. 

heres my log..

Im sure that this is something from avast because i had message that lol.launcher is suspicious but I clicked to add this as false alarm and then I still couldn't open this, logo just showing for 2 seconds and then nothing happening. I uninstalled avast and did all steps from this post but it still dont working.
Im adding my log into attachment.
If your on Windows 8, the fixit doesnt work... can't be run on their most recent operating system..

For this, you will have to perform it manually. On the Fixit, there is a section for Let me Fix it myself which are the steps you will have to take as Microsoft hasn't provided a Fixit for Windows 8. You can find that [here!](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/972034#LetMeFixItMyselfAlways)

your LoLpatcherUX uses 100% of my CPU.
Fix it riot.
I can't even patch league.
Reroll your game back to 4.19 when the game worked.
Kthxbye.

I have almost tried everything. My PC is up to date I have AVG. When I try to start my league up the badge pops up for a sec and then disappears then the badge pops up again but with a loading bar then disappears after a sec so I go in my task manager and the process LOL_patcher.exe 32 is still there im running a 64 bit idk if thats the problem. I don't know if I posted the right patch log btw.Thank you
EDIT: I'm seeing the lolpatcher.exe in the task manager I'm 70% sure that its downloading stuff but I'm not sure
I dont know why Riot screws up in this buggy patcher all the time!Please,please,part from concentrating on yuor great updates keep a watch on the launcher too,its the main thing after all! :p
Ive been having a problem launching the game... i click on the icon and the logo pops up and then nothing... its been like this for a while now and i cant seem to find a solution to fixing this..
i was in platnum rank, then after this patch it took me to bronze and switched all my match history, i ask to be put back in plat
i just deleted the whole patcher folder and it fixed it LOL folder > projects> deleted lol_patcher. just had to wait for it to reload but, it worked just fine

LoL riot, lol... Uninstall antivirus, yeah sounds legit.

What worked for me (after trying a lot of **user** suggestions) is to go to lol folder and run the **lol.launcher.admin** instead of the regular launcher. 

After doing this once, the regular launcher works as well.
